Title: The Horde Slayer
Description:
Wow! Keep it up, soldier! 

Slay a bit more Horde and you will go down in the record books among the Alliance. 

But it won't be easy, the Horde have put a bounty on your head, so watch it!

For the Alliance!
ObjectivesText: While being hunted by the Horde, slay 10 Horde without dying.
